name: CCG Historically Accurate Paul Bunyan
description:
Created for Historically Accurate Game Jam 4.

Based on the folklore story of Paul Bunyan and The Mosquitoes.

Good Old Giant Paul Bunyan was tired of the massive Mosquitos bothering him and the rest of the logging crew. So, he brought some big Bees to take care of them. However, the bugs got married and their children are causing havoc. Now, as Paul Bunyan, you must fight off these huge Hybrids as you keep the logging crew cabins safe.

Controls:

A, D and Arrow Keys: Move left and right

eR: Attack and Chop wood

rT: Repair cabins
